title: Cody Simpson steps out with sister Alli after saying Miley Cyrus 'won't listen to him'
text:
Cody Simpson stepped out with sister Alli on Thursday, after he was heard complaining about new girlfriend Miley Cyrus at Sydney pool.

The Surfboard singer took his mind off things and appeared to put on a brave face by attending a Pandora event in the city.

It comes after he was overheard saying that the American singer, 26, 'won't listen to him' and that 'everyone in Australia hates him.'

Putting on a brave face? Cody Simpson stepped out with sister Alli (pictured) at a Pandora event in Sydney on Thursday night... after saying girlfriend Miley Cyrus 'won't listen to him' and that 'everyone in Australia HATES him'

Cody, 22, wore faded blue jeans and a white T-shirt, which he teamed with a pink and yellow patterned shirt.

He covered his blond locks with a navy cap and teamed the look with black boots.

Alli meanwhile, looked stylish in a pink fitted blazer and black trousers and heels.

Casual: Cody, 22, wore faded blue jeans and a white T-shirt, which he teamed with a pink and yellow patterned shirt

Putting it behind him? He was overheard complaining about new girlfriend Miley Cyrus while enjoying a swim at Andrew Boy Charlton Pool in Sydney on Thursday

It comes after Cody was overheard complaining about his new love Miley Cyrus while enjoying a swim at a Sydney pool on Thursday.

Simpson, 22, who has been in Australia to film the surprise TV hit The Masked Singer, was on the phone to a friend from Andrew Boy Charlton Pool on Thursday morning, when he was heard discussing his new romance.

'We had a weird one yesterday... not really an argument but she kind of shut down,' Simpson was overheard saying.

'She kind of shut down': Simpson, 22, who has been in Australia to film the surprise TV hit The Masked Singer, was on the phone to a friend from Andrew Boy Charlton Pool on Thursday morning, when he was heard discussing his new romance

'Yeah, it was kind of s**tty, but whatever,' he added.

A Speedo-clad Simpson then spoke about the negative response to his new romance from fans in Australia, saying that his fellow countrymen remain loyal to Miley's estranged husband, Liam Hemsworth.

'I'm copping s**t here because of [her] exes. You know, her husband is Australian,' Simpson said, according to an onlooker sitting nearby.

'I'm copping s**t here': A Speedo-clad Simpson then spoke about the negative response to his new romance from fans in Australia, saying that his fellow countrymen remain loyal to Miley's estranged husband, Liam Hemsworth

The onlooker said Simpson spent some time stretching and warming up before getting into the water and swimming a few laps of butterfly.

The Golden Thing hitmaker flew into Sydney on Monday, just hours before he was unmasked as the Robot on the local version of The Masked Singer.

During his subsequent media rounds, he spoke about his blossoming relationship with Cyrus in virtually every TV and radio interview.

Simpson and Cyrus began dating just two months after the American singer announced her separation from Hemsworth, who she married in a private ceremony in December.
description: Cody Simpson stepped out with sister Alli on Thursday, after he was heard complaining about new girlfriend Miley Cyrus at Sydney pool.
authors: Monique Friedlander For Daily Mail Australia
